short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We at MomKnows are working hard at making sure your children aren't seeing things they shouldn't.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enable a home where you know for a fact that your kids aren't 'accidentally' seeing things they cannot unsee later. 

This chrome extension has two available functionalities:
1. free: pop up alerts for when landing on malicious or phishing web pages 
2. paid: accurate, live-copy of the online surfing and URL visited by your children; even when they click on 'clear browsing data' or 'delete history'.

Talk to us! mom@momknows.co
